column1: Origins: The origins of baseball are debated
column2: but the modern version of the game developed in the United States in the early 19th century.

column1: First Professional Team: The Cincinnati Red Stockings
column3: are recognized as the first fully professional baseball team.

column1: Major Leagues: Major League Baseball (MLB) in the United States consists of the National League (NL) and the American League (AL)

column2: the annual championship series of MLB
column3: has been played between the NL and AL champions since 1903.

column1: International Play: Baseball is played professionally in many countries
column5: and was an Olympic sport from 1992 to 2008
